action_output:
Reason: To add a contact to the favorites list, I need to open the Contacts app first. The Contacts app is not visible on the home screen, but it might be accessible through the Phone app. I will open the Phone app to check if the Contacts section is available there.

action_output:
Reason: The current screen does not show any interface for adding a contact to the favorites list. Instead, it appears to show a specific phone number. I need to return to the contacts list to locate the relevant contact to add to favorites. I will tap the back button to navigate back to the previous screen.
Action: {"action_type": "click", "index": 41}
action_reason: The current screen does not show any interface for adding a contact to the favorites list. Instead, it appears to show a specific phone number. I need to return to the contacts list to locate the relevant contact to add to favorites. I will tap the back button to navigate back to the previous screen.
summary: Action selected: {"action_type": "click", "index": 41}. Tapped the back button to return to the contacts list, successfully navigated back to the main contacts screen.
